Summary: In which Derek Hale, a young erotic novelist, takes a wrong turn one night, and accidentally scares a stranger in a dark alley‚ÄîStiles Stilinski, a deaf person who does everything he can to pretend his world hasn‚Äôt gone quiet. Their rocky first meeting turns into borrowed books, shared tea, and unexpected comfort as Stiles slips into Derek‚Äôs life with sharp eyes, stubborn warmth, and a presence Derek didn‚Äôt know he was missing. entry.title: Eichen Fallout
entry.summary:
Author: mieczyslawstilinskihale

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,066Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Supernatural... sometimes it can feel so human. Stiles and Isaac first met during stressful situations. Isaac grew up in an extremely abusive household with a father he believes is a serial killer. Stiles, an orphan, was stuck at Eichen, which housed both adult and juvenile wards on the same property. One fateful night, Stiles, feeling overwhelmed by the abuse‚Äîthe constant torture and testing‚Äîdecided to escape. He ran to a place where he felt safe, which was a place Isaac didn't. Years later, they meet again, and this time it wasn't a chance encounter. Stiles had been adopted by the Sheriff and was attending his senior year. Even though they had only met once, the two sort of became a comfort to each other when it came to feeling unsafe. Stiles always thought he would be safe once he was out of Eichen, but he was in more danger with a bunch of Cultists connected to Eichen stalking him and his friends... and what is believed to be the savior growing in Stiles' belly.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,589Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 4

Summary: Melissa McCall muses on her son growing up, her blossoming romance with the Sheriff, and her strained relationship with Rafael. In the wake of Void's destructive actions, memory becomes a powerful tool. Natalie Martin, meanwhile, ponders her choices. Hiding her banshee powers, watching helplessly as Lydia harnessed her abilities in a way Natalie never could. Her choice, now, to return to a world that she hoped long ago to leave behind. entry.title: The Part That Survives
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,707Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 9

Summary: Years after the events of Season 6B, Beacon Hills has grown quieter. The monsters sleep, the pack has built lives, and Liam Dunbar has learned how to breathe again after losing the person he loved most. But grief is strange in Beacon Hills. It doesn‚Äôt fade. It rearranges itself into something sharp, something hungry, something that whispers: What if? Five months after Theo Raeken‚Äôs death, strange storms begin forming in the woods. Lights flicker. Trees crack with electricity. Liam dreams of Theo like he‚Äôs standing right beside him‚Äîuntil the line between dream and reality blurs violently. Because Theo isn‚Äôt dead.Not really.Not anymore. Something dragged him back wrong‚Äîhalf energy, half ghost, half chimera, flickering and unstable‚Äîand every time he gets close to Liam, the static under his skin grows worse. The pack rallies. Old bonds strengthen. New ones form. And Liam faces the terrifying truth: loving someone who‚Äôs come back from the dead means learning how to hold them together without losing yourself. But Theo didn‚Äôt come back for revenge. Or redemption. He came back for Liam.

entry.title: Full Moons and Family Drama
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,033Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 94

Summary: Talia Hale survives the Hale Fire, along with Laura, Derek, Peter, and Cora. It's been roughly ten years since the events of that night, and to say that it left scars would be an understatement. Desperate to bring her Pack back to its old strength, Talia will not stop pushing her children and brother to settle down and have kids of their own. For this year's Cold Moon, Peter finally brings someone home. Stiles is not at all what Talia was expecting. He's far too young for Peter, he's human, and worst of all a man. (No biological children to carry on the Pack). He also doesn't give a shit what Talia says about him. His mere presence is enough to have her melting down, and it's bad for the simmering tension between her and the rest of the Pack. Unfortunately, everyone else likes him. Derek might like him more than the rest. A little too much. Aw hell, he has a crush on his uncle's boyfriend. Or: Five times Peter brought Stiles to a Full Moon Run + One time Derek did. (Updates every other Tuesday)

entry.title: Big Trouble

Author: MerylStar

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,057Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 92

Summary: But the ever more solidifying idea of strangling his only son was discouraged from becoming reality only by the annoying yet increasingly worrying detail that there still was no son to strangle in the first place.Stiles was going to be in so much trouble when he got back.Or: the aftermath of another fight leaves John with more answers than he asked for.
